currentValue().details: Most oracles don't require a state change for pricing, for those who do, override this function

peekValue().details: some oracles require a state change to get the exact current price.      This is updated when calling other state changing functions that query the price

STETH_ANCHORED_VIEW_UNDERLYING().notice: The oracle of the underlying asset

peekValue().notice: returns the price with 18 decimals without any state changes

documentation.text: @notice The oracle of the underlying asset

@notice The current reported value of the oracle
 @return _value The current value
